浸.definition: to immerse; to soak; to steep; gradually

浸染.definition: to be contaminated; to be gradually influenced

浸水.definition: to immerse in water; to drench; to inundate; irrigation water

浸泡.definition: to steep; to soak; to immerse

浸淫.definition: (literary) (of a liquid or vapor etc) to permeate; to saturate; to suffuse; (literary) (fig.) to be steeped; to be immersed (in an environment, field of study, emotion etc)

浸潤.definition: to permeate; to percolate; fig. to saturate (with emotion)

浸種.definition: to soak seeds (in water to hasten germination, or in a chemical solution to prevent damage from insects etc)

浸豬籠.definition: to drown sb in a wicker basket, a form of 沉潭[chen2 tan2]

浸透.definition: to soak; to saturate; to drench; to permeate
